name: com.darkeyes.tricks

releases.name: Dark Tricks v2.23
releases.description:
Force small clock on lockscreen (Android 12+)
Adjust height for back gesture (Android 12+)
releases.descriptionHTML:
Force small clock on lockscreen (Android 12+)
Adjust height for back gesture (Android 12+)

releases.name: Dark Tricks v2.22
releases.description: Add haptic feedback to volume keys skip track
releases.descriptionHTML: Add haptic feedback to volume keys skip track

releases.name: Dark Tricks v2.21
releases.description: Added compatibility with Android 12.1 for some tricks
releases.descriptionHTML: Added compatibility with Android 12.1 for some tricks

releases.name: Dark Tricks v2.20
releases.description:
Added option to show the battery duration estimate on expanded QS
Added quick unlock for PIN/Password. To use, add Settings to the hooked apps and recreate your PIN/Password.
releases.descriptionHTML:
Added option to show the battery duration estimate on expanded QS
Added quick unlock for PIN/Password. To use, add Settings to the hooked apps and recreate your PIN/Password.

releases.name: Dark Tricks v2.19
releases.description: Improvements to double tap to sleep

releases.name: Dark Tricks v2.18
releases.description: Added double tap to sleep on the statusbar and on the lockscreen (separate toggles)
releases.descriptionHTML: Added double tap to sleep on the statusbar and on the lockscreen (separate toggles)

releases.name: Dark Tricks v2.17
releases.description: Added the option to bypass Outlook device policy
releases.descriptionHTML: Added the option to bypass Outlook device policy

releases.name: Dark Tricks v2.16
releases.description: Fixed hiding next alarm on lockscreen on Android 12
releases.descriptionHTML: Fixed hiding next alarm on lockscreen on Android 12

releases.name: Dark Tricks v2.15
releases.description:
Initial release

Everything should be working except hiding next alarm on lockscreen
releases.descriptionHTML:
Initial release

Everything should be working except hiding next alarm on lockscreen

readme:
This module is designed for Android 8.0, 8.1, 9, 10, 11, 12 and 12.1. Some tricks might not work on every version though. It has been tested on stock Android 12.1 on a Pixel 6. You can try it on other ROMs, but don't report bugs if something doesn't work.

Here is what the module can do:

- Force dark theme even on light wallpaper (Android 8.1 only)
- Replace voice assist with phone on lockscreen (Android 8.0 and 8.1 only)
- Always show the navbar on the right when in landscape (Android 8.0, 8.1 and 9 only)
- Hide next alarm on the lockscreen and in the quick settings and the icon in the status bar
- Show 4G instead of LTE
- Hide LTE+/4G+ (always show LTE/4G)
- Hide ADB notification
- Hide VPN notification
- Hide "Network may be monitored"
- Hide the build version in the QS when developer options are enabled (Android 10+)
- Double tap to sleep on statusbar or lockscreen (Android 12+)
- Volume keys control cursor
- Volume keys skip track
- Power key toggle torch (with proximity check)
- Prevent accidental wake up
- Less frequent notifications
- Screen off notifications only
- Change the carrier text
- Bypass Outlook device policy
- Quick unlock (Android 12+)
- Show battery duration estimate on expanded QS (Android 12+)
- Force small clock on lockscreen (Android 12+)
- Adjust height for back gesture (Android 12+)

There is a simple user interface that can be launched through Xposed Manager to choose what mods that you want. However, a reboot is needed every time you change a setting.

summary: A simple module for Android 8.0, 8.1, 9, 10, 11 and 12 that puts together a collection of different mods (tricks).
